creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in memory of Roberta Grodberg Simmons
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: long sleeveless tunic with square neckline; two panels sewn together; wide red stripes alternating with narrower multicolored stripe bands; green stripes under arms; multicolored stitching around neck and down center front and back approximately halfway
title: Woman's Blouse
